title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled. Even if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification", the build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when the user has selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences -> Workbench.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when the user has selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences -> Workbench.
SR:
1. Open Preferences -> Workbench.
2. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
3. Go to the Java perspective.
4. Right-click to open the context sensitive popup menu.
5. Verify that the "Build" action is disabled in the menu.
